channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 通宵会谈后，世贸组织发布新的贸易协定草案，一些问题仍未解决
item.description:
WTO issues new draft trade deals after all-night talks, some issues unresolved https://t.co/c50WVfmBwm pic.twitter.com/VL2fpRnqXP

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: Meta 将停止为 Facebook 上出现的内容向澳大利亚新闻出版商支付费用，从而与堪培拉展开新一轮较量。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Meta it will stop paying Australian news publishers for content that appears on Facebook, setting up a fresh battle with Canberra which had led the world with a law that forces internet giants to strike licensing deals. More here: https://t.co/RNgO7j1u8k

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: Breakingviews - 印度制造可彰显中国特色
item.description:
Breakingviews - Make in India can dial up Chinese characteristics https://t.co/ihzpAIKH2Z https://t.co/ihzpAIKH2Z

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 特斯拉推出了包括保险补贴在内的新激励措施，以吸引中国这一全球最大汽车市场的消费者，这家美国电动汽车巨头正在中国与比亚迪等根深蒂固的竞争对手展开旷日持久的价格战。更多信息请点击这里：
item.description:
Tesla unveiled new incentives, including insurance subsidies, to woo consumers in China, the world's largest auto market, where the US electric vehicle giant is in a protracted price war against entrenched rivals such as BYD. More here: https://t.co/dgXFJvGXCj

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 库博公司因隐形眼镜需求强劲而上调年度收入预期
item.description:
Cooper Companies lifts annual revenue forecast on strong contact lens demand https://t.co/PV2a4LTd2Y pic.twitter.com/pwxmzSQrFY

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 越南执政党共产党在准备扩大工人权利时指示官员控制工会，同时密切监视外国组织和出国旅行的公民。
item.description:
Vietnam's ruling Communist Party has directed officials to control trade unions as the country prepares to expand workers' rights, alongside closely monitoring foreign organizations and citizens travelling abroad, according to an advocacy group https://t.co/pWWinyRc0u pic.twitter.com/P8Y65gViUK

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 2 月份，亚洲主要制造业经济体努力摆脱衰退，日本尤其受到需求急剧下降的挤压，而中国不均衡的复苏则掩盖了该地区其他国家的一些改善迹象。
item.description:
Asia's major manufacturing economies struggled to claw their way out of decline in February with Japan particularly squeezed by a steeper fall in demand while an uneven recovery in China overshadowed some signs of improvement elsewhere in the region https://t.co/XAL5Zn0zi5

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 摩根大通选择汇丰银行和 StanChart 管理香港和台湾 5000 亿美元的托管业务
item.description:
JPMorgan picks HSBC, StanChart to run $500 bln custody business in Hong Kong, Taiwan https://t.co/CFjhOfEfaa pic.twitter.com/BGF4RTLl0D

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: Meta 表示，它不会在澳大利亚、法国和德国就传统新闻内容达成新的商业协议。更多信息，请点击此处：
item.description:
Meta said it will not enter into new commercial deals for traditional news content in Australia, France and Germany. More here: https://t.co/hZHwnt8weL

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 迪斯尼与印度 Reliance 资产的合并将创造出一个远超所有竞争对手的媒体巨头，亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）的娱乐野心也将通过流媒体技术实力和利润丰厚的板球版权得到提升。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
A Disney-Reliance assets merger in India will create a media giant far bigger than all its rivals, boosting billionaire Mukesh Ambani's entertainment ambitions with streaming tech prowess and lucrative cricket rights. More here:https://t.co/w3U25t12DG

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：苹果公司放弃了长达十年之久的进入残酷的汽车制造行业的努力。@JMAGuilford 解释说，汽车是获取客户时间和数据的一种方式，但这家 iPhone 制造商有更好的选择。阅读更多
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: Apple has given up on a decade-long quest to enter the cutthroat carmaking business. Autos are one way to capture customers’ time and data, but the iPhone maker has better options, @JMAGuilford explains. Read more: https://t.co/4gISvshy83 pic.twitter.com/1ZzRrHq3xi

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 纽约社区银行公司（New York Community Bancorp）更换了首席执行官，报告第四季度亏损是其之前声明的 10 倍以上，并在文件中披露了其财务报告中的错误，导致其股价暴跌。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
New York Community Bancorp replaced its CEO, reported a fourth-quarter loss that was more than 10 times what it previously stated and disclosed faults in its financial reporting in filings that sent its shares tumbling. More here: https://t.co/z1TBi4IUPZ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 华特迪士尼创始人罗伊-迪士尼（Roy Disney）和华特-迪士尼（Walt Disney）的孙子支持首席执行官鲍勃-艾格（Bob Iger）和董事会，同时反对激进投资者围攻公司。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
The grandchildren of Roy and Walt Disney, founders of Walt Disney have backed CEO Bob Iger and the board, while opposing activist investors encircling the company. More here: https://t.co/HfSO3YnqCa

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 受与人工智能相关的科技股以及符合预期的通胀数据提振，美国 500 指数和纳斯达克指数创下历史最高收盘水平。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
The S&P 500 and Nasdaq finished at their highest closing levels ever, buoyed by tech stocks linked to AI and inflation data that met forecasts. More here: https://t.co/I8Y7SCE5T8 pic.twitter.com/eLldR6Arhb

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 多伦多证券交易所创下三年来最长月度连胜纪录
item.description:
TSX notches longest monthly winning streak in three years https://t.co/3xxJXnUhVV pic.twitter.com/E2EbF7Acwl

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 美国1月份通胀数据显示为三年来最小的年度增幅，这令投资者欢欣鼓舞，因为这意味着美联储可能会受到鼓励而降息。更多信息
item.description:
US inflation data pointed to the smallest annual rise in three years in January, cheering investors as it meant the Fed may be encouraged to cut interest rates. Read more: https://t.co/KT0Ymz8R52 pic.twitter.com/RbmvY0e0TM

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：苹果公司已经为其长达十年之久的电动汽车项目--泰坦计划（Project Titan）拉开了帷幕。但 @JMAGuilford 表示，随着电动汽车行业形势转坏，这家 iPhone 制造商还有其他选择来抓住客户。更多信息
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: Apple has drawn the curtains on Project Titan, its decade-long electric-vehicle effort. But with the EV industry taking a turn for the worse, the iPhone maker has other options to capture customers, says @JMAGuilford. Read more: https://t.co/4gISvsi5XB pic.twitter.com/KdaJmk8MFt

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，美国证券交易委员会正在审查 OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）的内部通信，作为调查该公司投资者是否被误导的一部分。阅读更多
item.description:
The US Securities and Exchange Commission is scrutinizing internal communications by OpenAI CEO Sam Altman as part of an investigation into whether the company's investors were misled, the Wall Street Journal reported. Read more: https://t.co/r1XqSifNty pic.twitter.com/OHfQr4CXXO

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 路透社关于竞争调查的报道引发瑞银股价波动
item.description:
UBS shares wobble on Reuters report over competition investigation https://t.co/onUnLKaZgG pic.twitter.com/uieqXiLlNw

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 观看：在空置写字楼和利率上升的双重压力下，英国房地产投资信托基金（REITs）今年迄今为止的表现相当糟糕。请收听 AJ Bell 的 Russ Mould 从相反的角度阐述投资者应如何看待这一市场。
item.description:
WATCH: Pinched by dual headwinds of empty offices and higher interest rates, UK's Real Estate Investment Trusts or REITs have done quite badly thus far this year. Listen-in to a contrarian view of how investors should view this market from Russ Mould of AJ Bell pic.twitter.com/GBfoftvoPy

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 尽管市场困难重重，圣戈班仍预计 2024 年营业利润率将达到两位数
item.description:
Saint-Gobain sees 2024 double-digit operating margin despite difficult market https://t.co/aHOy7BwR10 pic.twitter.com/j0YCPwPOBK

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: BBVA 将成立新的全球清洁技术金融部门

BBVA to set up new global finance unit for clean technologies https://t.co/xveFRRIQgK pic.twitter.com/dPleSkl0ao

item.title: 观看：百威英博销售额超出预期，年度股息提高了 9%。但由于投资者权衡了缺乏新的股票回购、美国销售不佳以及阿根廷恶性通货膨胀的影响，百威英博股价下滑了 2%。
item.description:
WATCH: AB InBev beat sales estimates and raised its annual dividend by nine percent. But its shares slipped two percent as investors weighed the absence of a new share buyback, poor US sales and the impact of hyperinflation in Argentina https://t.co/glJX97gpkw pic.twitter.com/cityXx7xyz

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024
